name: Milolii fisheries management area
text:
The Milolii fisheries management area, as defined in the administrative rules of the department of land and natural resources, shall be designated a community based subsistence fishing area, as provided in section 188-22.6.  The department of land and natural resources shall adopt management strategies and other rules consistent with section 188-22.6 that:
     (1)  Ensure long-term sustainable populations of fish and other marine species; and
     (2)  Encourage the scientific study and understanding of subsistence fishing management. [L 2005, c 232, §2]
